name: Supernatural ClassRoom
description:
You have been trapped in what seems to be your high school, but everything is different.

Survive and escape this spooky supernatural adventure to win.Collect the notes left by the previous victims to discover the mysteries of this place, will you be able to collect them all? Will you be able to escape alive?

I challenge you to manage to find all the notes scattered throughout the game.

Whoever finds all 9 notes, please upload an image in the comments for all of us to see!

Game created for the Enigma Game Jam. I hope you enjoy it and that it scares you.

Use the E button to interact

Use shift key to sprint

Move with the WASD keys

- Music and SFX from Zapsplat.com

- 3D Assets : Dmitry Dryzhak and Rukas Skirkevicius
